about_the_game:
A game pitting the cunning strategy of the Spawn Master (SM) against the teamwork and bravery of the Humans, Spawn Master is two unique gameplay experiences in one. Spawn Master combines FPS and RTS experience into one terrifying package. In each round, a willing player is chosen to be the. SM's job is to summon and command enemies and kill the remaining Humans. The unlucky who didn't get picked, assume the role of a Humans. Their goal is to stay alive and complete the map objectives.

The Spawn Master must strategize in real-time to use the tools at his disposal in an attempt to thwart the Human player from completing map objectives and avoiding traps in order to escape or defeat the Spawn Master.


As a Human, your job is to stay alive while completing the map's objectives and avoiding Enemies activated by the Spawn Master. Objectives are displayed to you at the beginning of a round and will appear throughout gameplay. Along the way will be traps, triggers, spawners, and exploration rewards that strongly engage the players.



features


  • Asymmetric Gameplay: "Spawn Master" features an asymmetric multiplayer experience where one player assumes the role of the "Spawn Master," controlling the zombie horde and environmental hazards, while the other players take on the roles of human survivors trying to complete objectives and stay alive.

  • RTS Elements: The Spawn Master player is essentially a real-time strategy player, commanding the zombie horde forces and setting traps to hinder the human players' progress. This strategic gameplay adds depth and tension to the usual first-person shooter gameplay.

    • Objective-Based Gameplay: Human players must work together to complete objectives and achieve their goals while fending off the zombie threat. These objectives could range from reaching a safe zone to activating certain devices or gathering supplies.

      • Variety of enemy Types: Spawn Master introduces a variety of different zombie types, each with unique abilities and characteristics. Some enemy types are better for different situations. Be careful what monsters you summon and when.

        • Environmental Hazards: The Spawn Master can manipulate the environment to create hazards for the human players. This might involve triggering traps, blocking paths, or causing parts of the environment to collapse.

          • Teamwork and Strategy: Both sides must utilize teamwork and strategy to succeed. The human players need to coordinate their actions, share resources, and protect each other, while the Spawn Master player needs to plan their attacks, manage resources, and anticipate the survivors' moves.

content_descriptors.notes: There is intence GORE. Beheads, amputations and such and a lot of blood.

name: Spawn Master

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS: Windows 10 (64bit version only)
  • Processor: CPU: Intel® Core™ i5-6600 / AMD Ryzen™ 5 2500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon™ R9 390X (or equivalent with 4 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB (SSD recommended) GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Headphones recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
